Why Generic CRMs Fail You

Off-the-shelf solutions promise everything but deliver frustration

Generic Workflows Don't Fit

You bend your business to fit the software. Every day you waste time clicking through features you don't need while missing the ones you do.

Custom Development Is Expensive

Hiring developers costs €10k+ upfront. Then you need ongoing maintenance. Most small businesses simply can't justify the investment.

Spreadsheets Don't Scale

Your spreadsheet workaround worked when you had 10 clients. Now with 100+ clients, it's breaking. Data silos, errors, and chaos multiply.

The Solution: Built for You, Not Against You

We build custom CRMs that fit your business like a glove. Fast, affordable, and completely yours.

1

2 Weeks, Not 2 Months

Our streamlined process delivers your custom CRM in just 2 weeks. No lengthy discovery phases, no endless back-and-forth. Just rapid results.

2

1/3 the Cost of Developers

Why pay €50k+ for a development team when we can build it for a fraction? Our efficient process means you get premium results at startup budgets.

3

Fully Yours, Forever

No monthly SaaS fees. No vendor lock-in. The CRM we build is 100% yours. You own the code, the data, and the future.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about our custom CRM development

All revisions during the first 2 weeks after launch are included at no extra cost. We want to make sure your CRM works perfectly for your needs. After that, we offer affordable hourly rates for any additional changes or can discuss extended support packages.
Usually, yes! We have experience integrating with popular tools like email providers, accounting software, calendar apps, and more. During our initial consultation, we'll discuss your specific integration needs and provide a clear plan for how we'll connect your systems.
All packages include dedicated support: Basic includes 3 months, Pro includes 6 months, and Enterprise includes 12 months. After your support period, you can extend it with our affordable maintenance plans or handle updates independently since you own the code.
Your CRM is built to scale! Since it's custom-built for your needs, we can easily add users, features, and integrations as you grow. We'll discuss your growth plans during development and build in the flexibility you need for the future.
